name: Disco Elysium Inkjs Template
description:
This is a proof-of-concept game in the style of Disco Elysium, using Ink's js port. It's a quick tutorial and template, and mainly meant to show off what's possible! Best viewed in full screen.

More information about it (and how to create your own) can be found on GitHub, and you can get started with Ink very easily.

If you liked this, you'd probably like the Twine Macros or the potential Ao3 style this was partially inspired by!
